title: Net magnetic field near two current carrying wires

content.question: Current I flows into and out of the page in two parallel, long, straight wires that are fixed at two vertices of an equilateral triangle, as shown above. The net magnetic field at the third vertex (point P) due to these currents is in which of the following directions?

choices.label: Choice A shows an arrow pointing down.
Choice B shows an arrow pointing straight up.
Choice C shows an arrow pointing to the right.
Choice D shows an arrow pointing to the left.

content.answer: Choice A shows an arrow pointing down.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
